title: Flash Furniture Erik Comfortable & Stylish Contemporary Barstool with Rounded Mid-Back and Foot Rest, Adjustable Height - Black Vinyl with Gold Base, Set of 2
features: Pack of 2: Take a load off and hang out in comfort and style with this colorful adjustable height barstool. Whether you're having breakfast at the kitchen counter or paired with a pub table for card night, this "eye candy" is sure to be a hit!
Rounded mid back design, vinyl upholstery, cutout design
17.625" gold base with footrest to promote good posture and relieve leg pressure for a comfortable seating experience
Contemporary style barstool fits nicely in your home kitchen or dining room
PRODUCT MEASUREMENTS: Overall Size: 16"W x 19"D x 35-44"H; Seat Size: 16"W x 14.5"D x 24-33"H; Back Size: 16"W x 12"H
description: Everyone knows that the classics never go out of style and this black vinyl upholstered adjustable height barstool is the perfect example. A great fit for your breakfast bar or kitchen counter, this stool has a rounded mid-back design and a cutout back. Its seat and back are padded with 1.5" of foam and upholstered in vinyl. The height adjustable swivel seat easily adjusts from counter to bar height using the convenient gas lift handle, located just below the seat. The gold base and footrest complement the stool's modern design. A plastic ring, embedded in the base, protects your floor by sliding smoothly when you need to move the stool. Designed for residential use, this adjustable height barstool is an excellent choice when you need a versatile seating option for your home.
